main_definition: in addition to something previously mentioned or known.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a synonym of 'too' or 'as well', indicating an additional item, action, or point.
meanings_and_examples.example: I would like the soup and salad, also.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To use when listing multiple items or actions that are happening simultaneously or sequentially.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is studying for her exams and watching TV at the same time; she needs to manage her time effectively too.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating a connection between two ideas, emphasizing their similarity or relation.
meanings_and_examples.example: He's very talented as an artist, also being a skilled musician.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to add information that is not directly related but provides additional context.
meanings_and_examples.example: She didn't go to the party because she was sick. Also, her favorite movie premiered on TV last night.
